subject: Hello,Attention Please
body:
Hello,Attention Please
We are a United Kingdom Base Investment Company offering Corporate and Personal Investment Funding at a 3~7% ROI for a duration of 10 Years.
We also pay a 1% commission to brokers, who introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities.
Please get back to me if you are interested in more details.
Yours faithfully,
Henry Markson
Investment Analyst

subject: Re:   Hello,Attention Please
body:
Hello Henry Markson,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It sounds like an interesting opportunity! I'm always open to learning more about different investment options.

Could you please provide me with some more details? For instance, what kind of projects are you typically interested in funding? And could you elaborate a bit on the ROI and the duration of years?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sandra
